mapper.sql: order_id, order_zhifu_id, order_date, status, open_id, address_id, totle_price, wuliu_yunfei, yhq_flg, yhq_code, jifen_flg, jifen_dixiao, shiji_price, del_flg, c_date, c_user, u_date, u_user
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_id, order_zhifu_id, order_date, status, open_id, address_id, totle_price, wuliu_yunfei, yhq_flg, yhq_code, jifen_flg, jifen_dixiao, shiji_price, del_flg, c_date, c_user, u_date, u_user ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderZhifuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totlePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wuliuYunfei,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yhqFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhqCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jifenFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jifenDixiao,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shijiPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_order
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totle_price = #{totlePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wuliu_yunfei = #{wuliuYunfei,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
yhq_flg = #{yhqFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
yhq_code = #{yhqCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jifen_flg = #{jifenFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
jifen_dixiao = #{jifenDixiao,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shiji_price = #{shijiPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
c_date = #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_user = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_date = #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
u_user = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order_zhifu_id = #{orderZhifuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order set order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totle_price = #{totlePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wuliu_yunfei = #{wuliuYunfei,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yhq_flg = #{yhqFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, yhq_code = #{yhqCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jifen_flg = #{jifenFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, jifen_dixiao = #{jifenDixiao,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shiji_price = #{shijiPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, c_date = #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_user = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_date = #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, u_user = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order_zhifu_id = #{orderZhifuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select case when date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d')> left(ifnull(MAX(order_id),0),8) THEN CONCAT(date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ,'000001') ELSE ifnull(MAX(order_id),0) + 1 END as orderId from t_order
